list.abs: As Dr. Pauschs fans emailed his speech to friends sheepish ., 鲍什迷们不断将他的演讲发给朋友们.
She gives a sheepish smile as she opens yet another cupboard ., 她给一个羞怯的微笑 , 她又打开柜子.
She gives a sheepish smile as she opens yet another cupboard ., 她给一个羞怯的微笑 , 她又打开柜子.
With a sheepish grin , one of the other workers mutters ., 人群中有人偷笑 , 一个工人嘀咕着说.

entry.tran: 窘迫的;难为情的;尴尬的
entry.def: If you look sheepish, you look slightly embarrassed because you feel foolish or you have done something silly.

example.ex: The couple leapt apart when she walked in on them and later came downstairs looking sheepish.
example.tran: 她走进屋时撞见这对情侣，搞得两人赶紧分开，后来又面带窘色地走下楼来。

means.word_mean: 1. like or suggestive of a sheep in docility or stupidity or meekness or timidity

auth_sentence.content: How to excell in sheepish surgery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How to excell in sheepish surgery.

auth_sentence.content: Suddenly sheepish, I duck my head and comply, two steps behind Maureen.

auth_sentence.content: He looked sheepish not, I would guess, a normal look for him.

means.word_mean: 羞怯的,腼腆的;不好意思的,困窘的
